## Data 

* R package called StatsBombR

* Event data from 64 matches with 226,146 observations and 100 variables

* Variables of interest: 
  - 'is.goal', 'distance.to.gk', 'DistToGoal', 'angle.to.gk', 'angle.to.goal', 'gk.to.goalline', 'play_pattern.name','shot.body_part.name', 'shot.type.name', 'shot.technique.name'
